terms.meaning: Specific platform ke liye developed application.
terms.example: iOS Swift app, Android Kotlin app.

terms.meaning: Multiple platforms pe run hone wala single codebase.
Web technology use kar ke native-like mobile experience.
Mobile devices ke liye optimized user interface design.
App visibility improve karna app stores mein.
Users ko real-time messages send karna.
Internet connection ke bina app features use kar sakna.
App usage patterns aur user behavior track karna.
Mobile app ki speed aur responsiveness optimize karna.
Mobile applications mein security measures implement karna.
Different screen sizes ke liye adaptive layout.
Mobile devices mein touch-based interactions.
Mobile apps ke liye server-side services.
Mobile applications ki functionality aur usability test karna.
Mobile app development aur deployment automation.
Mobile apps se revenue generate karne ke methods.
Disabled users ke liye app accessibility features.
Mobile apps ko users tak deliver karne ka process.
Mobile app development ke liye ready-made tools.
Mobile devices mein local data storage solutions.
Data ko source se destination tak process karne ka workflow.
Extract, Transform, Load - data processing methodology.
Large-scale data storage aur analysis ke liye centralized repository.
Raw data ko natural format mein store karne ka repository.
terms.example: Hadoop HDFS, Amazon S3 data lake.

terms.meaning: Real-time data ko continuously process karna.
Large data volumes ko scheduled intervals mein process karna.
Data structure aur relationships define karna.
Data accuracy, completeness aur consistency ensure karna.
Data management policies aur procedures.
Large-scale data processing engine.
Distributed storage aur processing framework.
Non-relational database for flexible data storage.
Large datasets ko smaller chunks mein divide karna.
Data ko multiple locations mein copy karna.
Data structure changes ko handle karna over time.
Data ka origin aur transformation history track karna.
Database changes ko real-time track karna.
Available datasets ka searchable inventory.
Decentralized data architecture approach.
Batch aur stream processing combine karne ka pattern.
